channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Mormons Helped Make America’s Prepping Industry Into Big Business
item.description: How two big names in mainstream disaster preparedness helped sell Americans on fear, anxiety and a new generator.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase becomes the new issuer of the Apple Card
item.description: Apple expects the transition to take 24 months

item.title: Google and Character.AI negotiate first major settlements in teen chatbot death cases
item.description: The settlements are among the first tied to lawsuits accusing AI companies of harming users.

item.title: Waymo is rebranding its Zeekr robotaxi
Bose Promo Code: 40% Off Bose for January 2026
item.description: Enjoy at least 40% off headphones, speakers, soundbars, and other audio products from Bose.

item.title: Is Craigslist the Last Real Place on the Internet?
item.description: Millennials are still using Craigslist to find jobs, find love, and even to cast creative projects—eschewing other AI- and algorithm-dominated online ...

item.title: Ford has an AI assistant and new hands-free BlueCruise tech on the way
item.description: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.

item.title: Peacock Promo Codes: 16% Off January 2026
item.description: Stream your favorite shows for up to $80 off this month, and save on subscription plans with the latest Peacock TV coupons from WIRED.

item.title: This Is the Blood Glucose Monitor We’ve Been Waiting For
item.description: Makers of smartwatches and other wearables have spent years trying to measure blood sugar without pricking your skin. The PreEvnt Issac does just that...

item.title: Discord and Mercor investor Niko Bonatsos departs General Catalyst, plans new VC firm
item.description: Bonatsos spent 15 years at GC, and until last year led the firm's seed investing strategy.
